WHILE ON-DUTY, DID SEARCH A PERSON KNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT WITHOUT LEGAL JUSTIFICATION.

ON DUTY, ABUSED HIS AUTHORITY AS A MEMBER OF THE NEW YORK CITY POLICE DEPARTMENT, IN THAT HE SEARCHED A PERSON KNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT WITHOUT SUFFICIENT LEGAL AUTHORITY.
ON DUTY, HE SEARCHED A VEHICLE IN WHICH PERSON(S) KNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT WERE OCCUPANTS, WITHOUT SUFFICIENT LEGAL AUTHORITY.
ON DUTY,  ABUSED HIS AUTHORITY AS A MEMBER OF THE NEW YORK CITY POLICE DEPARTMENT, IN THAT HE FRISKED A PERSON KNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT WITHOUT SUFFICIENT LEGAL AUTHORITY.
WHILE ON-DUTY AUTHORIZED THE STRIP-SEARCH OF A PERSON KNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT WITHOUT SUFFICIENT LEGAL AUTHORITY.

charges.penalty: DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), VACATION DAYS (45 day(s) )

charges.description: SAID POLICE OFFICER KNOWINGLY ATTEMPTED TO PURCHASE ITEMS WITH GIFT CARDS THAT HAD BEEN OBTAINED WITH FRAUDULENT OR STOLEN CREDIT CARD INFORMATION.
charges.penalty: DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), SUSPENDED W/O PAY (15 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (45 day(s) )

charges.description: FAILED AND NEGLECTED TO REPORT HER INVOLVMENT IN THE ABOVE OFF-DUTY INCIDENT IN A TIMELY FASHION TO THE DESK OFFICER AT THE PRECINCT OF OCCURENCE, AS REQUIRED.
charges.penalty: DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), SUSPENDED W/O PAY (15 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (45 day(s) )

charges.description: KNOWINGLY ASSOCIATED WITH A PERSON REASONABLY BELIEVED TO BE ENGAGED IN, LIKELY TO ENGAGE IN OR TO HAVE ENGAGED IN CRIMINAL ACTIVITIES.
charges.penalty: DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), SUSPENDED W/O PAY (15 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (45 day(s) )

charges.description: WHILE OFFDUTY RECKLESSLY DROVE MOTOR VEHICLE 110MPH IN A 45MPH CONSTRUCTION ZONE
charges.penalty: DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), SUSPENDED W/O PAY (15 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (45 day(s) )

charges.description: WAS INVOLVED IN AN OFF-DUTY INCIDENT FAILED AND NEGLECTED TO REPORT SAID INCIDENT IN A TIMELY FASHION TO THE OPERATIONS UNIT
charges.penalty: DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), SUSPENDED W/O PAY (15 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (45 day(s) )

charges.description: DURING A VISIT TO A DEPARTMENT DISTRICT SURGON, HE MADE AN INACCURATE STATEMENT TO WIT: HE TOLD THE DEPARTMENT DISTRICT SURGEON THAT HE WAS UNABLE TO DRIVE A VEHICLE WHEN, IN FACT, HE WAS SUPSEQUENTLY OBSERVED OPERATING A VEHICLE.
charges.penalty: DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), VACATION DAYS (35 day(s) )

charges.description: ON APPROXIMATELY THREE OCCASIONS DETECTIVE CAUSED INACCURATE ENTRIES TO BE MADE IN DEPARTMENT MEDICAL DIVISION RECORDS.
charges.penalty: DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), VACATION DAYS (35 day(s) )

charges.description: ON APPROXIMATELY THREE OCCASIONS DETECTIVE EXAGGERATED THE EXTENT OF HIS INJURY WHEN HE VISITED DEPARTMENT DISTRICT SURGEONS AND INFORMED THEM THAT HE WAS UNABLE TO DRIVE A VEHICLE.
charges.penalty: DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), VACATION DAYS (35 day(s) )

charges.description: DETECTIVE EXAGGERATED THE EXTENT OF HIS INJURY WHEN HE VISITED DEPARTMENT DISTRICT SURGEONS.
charges.penalty: DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), VACATION DAYS (35 day(s) )
